channel.title: Home on Kitty corner of the internet
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Kitty corner of the internet

item.title: Dark academia
item.description: August did send its warning to the northeast- that week-long false break from humidity and stillness. (a contrapoint: in Minnesota, there’s two weeks of may mud before spring starts.) signs totally ignored. the pseudo season deftly came and left. along with, the wind blew away my sense of stopped time. At least, the weight of sunset falls square on the shoulders now. as the night bites back, rightly blue to righteous black, the summer is weathering down.

item.title: Sweet like sugar water
item.description: Sugar water is Maude Latour’s debut album. sheâ€™s airy, pop rising, floating light among mere mortals. and then it occurs to me that late August captures the precise seasonality of the album. well, i think the language of the album is this. sugar water marks the end of the summer as the end of the world. 'I had a vision of the north star.' The starting line of a song (track 9).
